hero-subtitle: Thank your team, clients and employees with a box of curated healthy treats and mindful products!
how-step-1-2: Fill out the form below with your budget, quantity and customizations in mind and one of our reps will contact you shortly.
how-step-2-2: A customized link will be provided to be sent to all recipients to gather shipping info and diet preferences.
how-step-3-2: All boxes will be shipped out directly to recipients for them to enjoy. We suggest hosting a virtual event to open the boxes all together!
contact-title: Get in touch to get started!
budget-quantity: Required budget and quantity of boxes
confirmation: An email with your company details have been sent to our reps.
error: An error occured with our mailing service... please email these details manually.
